data: `minecraft:celebrate_hunt` allows an entity to celebration when hunting a specific entity.

data.Name: broadcast
data.Description: If true, celebration will be broadcasted to other entities in the radius.

data.Name: [celeberation_targets](../FilterList.md)
data.Description: The list of conditions that target of hunt must satisfy to initiate celebration.

data.Name: celebrate_sound
data.Description: The sound event to play when the mob is celebrating

data.Name: radius
data.Description: If broadcast is enabled, specifies the radius in which it will notify other entities for celebration.

data.Name: sound_interval
data.Description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again
